name: THE IDOLM＠STER CINDERELLA GIRLS VIEWING REVOLUTION
name_original: THE IDOLM＠STER CINDERELLA GIRLS VIEWING REVOLUTION
description:
Purchase now to receive two exquisite special bonuses!

For a limited time, purchase THE IDOLM@STER CINDERELLA GIRLS and receive the specially designed DLC Producer's Wristband 'CINDERELLA GIRLS' usable during LIVE!

In addition, as a purchase bonus you get to enjoy the exclusive PlayStation®4 theme based off the new song 'Yes! Party Time!!(Game Version)'!

THE IDOLM@STER CINDERELLA GIRLS is now on PlayStation®VR!

CINDERELLA GIRLS' 1st LIVE venue set at 'Maihama Amphitheater' unfolds itself  to maximum 9 idols on stage. Let's witness their scintillating LIVE together!

Compilation comprises of 3 singles, including new song 'Yes! Party Time!!'!
Cheer for the idols as you match the song rhythm with concert light of your choice!

Enjoy the LIVE through PS VR various viewing perspective!

- 1 Player
- 2 GB HDD Minimum Size
- DUALSHOCK®4
- PlayStation®VR (Required)
- PlayStation®Move (Optional) - 2 PlayStation®Move
